trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> instance to and from Atom 1.0 format.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que serializa uma instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> para e do formato Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into an <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and the set of categories are specified within the element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço e o conjunto de categorias são especificados no elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into an <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and the set of categories are referenced using an URI.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço e o conjunto de categorias são referenciados usando um URI.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado contém um documento válido de categorias do Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid Atom 1.0 categories document.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contém um documento válido de categorias do Atom 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and contains the set of categories within the element.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço e que contém o conjunto de categorias dentro do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.InlineCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document and contains a URI reference to the set of categories within the element.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento de <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço e que contém uma referência de URI ao conjunto de categorias dentro do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> that can be serialized into a <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element within a service document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.ReferencedCategoriesDocument" /> que pode ser serializado em um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> dentro de um documento de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> para leitura.

trans-unit.source: Reads an Atom 1.0 <<see langword="atom:categories" />> element from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lê um elemento <<see langword="atom:categories" />> do Atom 1.0 da instância <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your own schema.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método para retornar o seu próprio esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> use to read the XML document.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> usado para ler o documento XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> used to write the XML node.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> usado para gravar no nó XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão de sindicalização usada pelo formatador.

trans-unit.source: The syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: A versão de distribuição usada pelo formatador.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] oferece suporte a versões de distribuição Atom 1.0 e RSS 2.0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> no qual ocorrerá a gravação.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Grava o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.CategoriesDocument" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.AtomPub10CategoriesDocumentFormatter" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> especificado.
